description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate uniform] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.4 x 8.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Rinhart, no. 85. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Purchased from: Lee's Headquaters, Fredeicksburg, Virginia, 2002. Subjects: Confederate States of America.--Army--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
